description.name: wethpolygon
description.tagline: Wrapped Ether polygon Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto polygon-weth Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept Wrapped Ether polygon directly on your website
Unique polygon/weth receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your polygon/weth wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
